document.full_text: lockheed martin's  proposal for the latest batch of f-35 fighter jets shows the price per plane creeping up on the pentagon's costliest u.s. weapons program, sources familiar with the program said.
document.title: lockheed's f-35 proposal shows cost creeping up
lines_and_colors: lockheed martin's  proposal for the latest batch of f-35 fighter jets shows the price per plane creeping up on the pentagon's costliest u.s. weapons program, sources familiar with the program said.
